product_overview: The E-Commerce Platform enables users and administrators to interact in a seamless online store environment. It supports user authentication, product and order management, administrative control, and content management, providing a comprehensive solution for online retail.
core_goals: Provide secure and reliable user authentication for users and admins.
Enable administrators to manage the platform including users, products, categories, orders, and shops.
Allow users to browse product catalogs, place and track orders, and manage their profiles.
Support management of multiple shops within the platform.
Provide CMS functionalities for managing static content pages.
Ensure role-based permissions and access control across the platform.
key_features: User Authentication with login, registration, password reset, and role differentiation between users and admins.
Admin Panel for managing users, products, categories, orders, and shops with dedicated views and controllers.
User Management including profile, order history, and interactions.
Product Catalog showcasing products by category with detailed product pages and images.
Order Management to create, track orders and manage order items.
Shop Management for handling multiple shops registered on the platform.
CMS Content Management for static pages to be maintained by admins.
Permissions and Roles management to enforce access control and authorization policies.
user_flow_summary: Users can register, login, and logout securely with role-based access (user or admin).
Users browse product catalogs filtered by categories and view detailed product information.
Users add products to their cart and place orders, then track order status from their account page.
Administrators log in to the admin panel to manage users, products, categories, orders, and shops.
Admins create and update content on static pages via the CMS for the platform.
Admins assign and update user roles and permissions to control access across features.
validation_criteria: Successful login and registration flows for both users and administrators.
Admins are able to CRUD users, products, categories, orders, and shops from the admin panel.
Users can view, filter, and search product catalogs reliably.
Order lifecycle from creation to tracking functions correctly with updates reflected in user profiles.
CMS pages display updated static content as managed by administrators.
Access control correctly restricts features based on user roles and permissions as intended.
Database migrations and seeders properly setup users, roles, categories, products, and other data with no errors.
